content: this gorgeous rowan cowl has a beautiful texture and is quick to work up this pattern is one of the july contributions to the 2025 scarf of the month cal > this pattern is available for free on > my blog or purchase the ad-free pdf as > a digital download above **materials ** * approximately 180 yds of a category 4 medium weight yarn i used jupiter moon farm moonshine yarn in the 04 seaside colorway * size i 5 5mm furls streamline crochet hook * yarn needle for weaving ends * scissors
